name: Code Z
description:
Game Objective- Playing the role of the Zombie professor, you have to successfully convert all the humans into zombies tackling the obstacles at different levels.

Caution- You just have 30 secs to complete each level.

Controls-
W - Move Forward
A - Move Left
S - Move Backward
D - Move Right

Additional Controls for multiplayer mode can be found in the Game Menu.
Don't forget to try the multiplayer mode, it is hell lot of fun.
